I'm glad you're interested in checking out James Avery and David Yurman! Both brands are known for their high-quality opal jewelry.

As for promotions and sales, I can give you a general idea of what's currently available. However, please note that promotions and sales can change frequently, so it's always best to check the brands' websites or visit their stores for the most up-to-date information.

* James Avery often has a "Deal of the Week" or "Limited Time Offer" section on their website, where they feature discounted items or special promotions.
* They also have a "Clearance" section where you can find discounted prices on select items.
* Sign up for their email newsletter to receive exclusive offers, early access to sales, and special promotions.
* Keep an eye on their social media accounts, as they sometimes offer exclusive promo codes or flash sales.

**David Yurman**:

* David Yurman often has a "Sale" or "Outlet" section on their website, where you can find discounted prices on select items.
* They occasionally offer limited-time promotions, such as "Buy One, Get One Free" or "20% Off" on specific collections.
* Sign up for their email newsletter to receive exclusive offers, early access to sales, and special promotions.
* Keep an eye on their social media accounts, as they sometimes offer exclusive promo codes or flash sales.

It's always a good idea to check the brands' websites, social media, or sign up for their newsletters to stay informed about current promotions and sales.

Remember, even if there aren't any promotions or sales currently available, it's still worth checking out their opal jewelry collections and prices. You might find a piece that you love, and it's always a good idea to invest in high-quality jewelry that will last a lifetime.
